title: Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL)-Based Science Inquiry Process

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Configuration of participatory learning environments utilizing social media platforms and real-time collaboration tools

learning_goals: Solve scientific inquiry problems through peer collaboration in CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) environments
Learners can construct scientific arguments and provide feedback using social media-based instructional methods.
Learners can effectively share learning content by utilizing real-time online collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Jamboard).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
